title: AI-Powered Customer Churn Prediction & Retention Dashboard
description: Streamlit + PyCaret AutoML with SHAP explainability and OpenAI recommendations. Upload customer data, train models, inspect churn drivers, and trigger retention strategies.

title: Personal Portfolio - Hosted on GitHub Pages
description: A responsive personal portfolio designed to present academic background, skills, and data projects. Built with HTML/CSS and powered by GitHub Pages + Formspree for direct contact.

title: Parking Prediction & Optimization in Aarhus
description: Combines real-time parking API data, weather, and congestion to forecast availability. ML models feed interactive dashboards to cut search time and city congestion.

title: Estimating Mobile Phone Price Ranges with ML
description: Built classification models on 2,000 phones with 21 features to predict price tiers. Highlights feature importance for market positioning and product strategy.

title: Predicting Stock Moves from Candlestick Images
description: A CNN trained from scratch to classify candlestick chart images and predict next-day stock direction. Tuned learning rates deliver stronger accuracy.

title: Predicting Customer Churn Before It Happens
description: How I built an AI-powered dashboard using PyCaret AutoML, XGBoost, SHAP explainability, and OpenAI to predict at-risk customers.

title: Forecasting Parking Availability in Aarhus
description: Blending live parking feeds, weather, Prophet, and XGBoost to predict where free spots will open in the city.

title: Can AI Read Candlestick Charts Like a Trader?
description: Building a CNN with TensorFlow to classify candlestick chart images and predict stock price movements.

title: Helping Bob Price His Phones: A Classification Journey in R
description: Building SVM and Decision Tree models in R to classify mobile phones into price ranges with 96.8% accuracy.

title: How to Pick the Right Chart Type
description: A visual guide with interactive charts to help you choose the perfect visualization for your data.

title: Jordan Toothpaste: A Brand Health Diagnosis
description: Using Dirichlet modeling, consumer panel data, and brand tracking surveys to diagnose loyalty and market reach.
